isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 7 Engine Service Manual - Exhaust Gas Recirculating (EGR) System - Cleaning, Inspection, and Testing - Exhaust Gas Recirculating (EGR) Valve Elbow Housing

svcproc.title: Exhaust Gas Recirculating (EGR) Valve Elbow Housing
svcproc.para: The EGR valve elbow housing is a one piece casting and may be cleaned with steam or suitable non-caustic solvents.
Clean contact areas of EGR O-ring in EGR valve elbow housing. Make sure carbon above and below contact areas can be vacuumed from EGR valve elbow housing. Vacuum loose carbon debris.
